Instructions.Value: This fusion-powered refit turns the ancient Gallant Urban Assault Vehicle into a long-range menance, heavily armored and packing a punch with its ER PPC Shotgun and LRM20. Two Streak SRM2s and a battery of MGs provide a little close-in firepower. Wheeled: Fast in open ground, slow in rough terrain. Movement: 3/5 Hex: 90/150 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 335 35 Left 285 35 Right 285 25 Rear 285 35 Turret 235 35 Total 1425 175
